subject: Re: Generalizing ?? !!
body:
Daniel Hulme writes:
> On Fri, Jun 22, 2007 at 03:40:37PM +0100, Aaron Crane wrote:
> >   my $b = 1 && 0 || 42;
> >   # Now $b is 17
> s/17/42/ or vice-versa, I think. 

Uh, yes.  Serves me right for trying to change metasyntactic numbers
midstream.

-- 
Aaron Crane
